00003 // Geant4
00004 #include "globals.hh"
00005 
00006 // STL
00007 #include <iostream>
00008 #include <sstream>
00009 #include <stdexcept>
00010 
00011 namespace ldmx {
00012 
00013     LHEEvent::LHEEvent(std::string& line) {
00014 
00015         std::istringstream iss(line);
00016         std::vector<std::string> tokens;
00017         do {
00018             std::string elem;
00019             iss >> elem;
00020             if (elem.size() != 0) {
00021                 tokens.push_back(elem);
00022             }
00023         } while (iss);
00024 
00025         if (tokens.size() != 6) {
00026             std::cerr << "ERROR: Bad event information record in LHE file ..." << std::endl;
00027             std::cerr << "  " << line << std::endl;
00028             G4Exception("LHEEvent::LHEEvent", "LHEEventError", FatalException, "Wrong number of tokens in LHE event information record.");
00029         }
00030 
00031         nup_ = atoi(tokens[0].c_str());
00032         idprup_ = atoi(tokens[1].c_str());
00033         xwgtup_ = atof(tokens[2].c_str());
00034         scalup_ = atof(tokens[3].c_str());
00035         aqedup_ = atof(tokens[4].c_str());
00036         aqcdup_ = atof(tokens[5].c_str());
00037     }
00038 
00039     LHEEvent::~LHEEvent() {
00040         for (std::vector<LHEParticle*>::iterator it = particles_.begin(); it != particles_.end(); it++) {
00041             delete (*it);
00042         }
00043         particles_.clear();
00044     }
00045

00070     void LHEEvent::addParticle(LHEParticle* particle) {
00071         particles_.push_back(particle);
00072     }

00074     const std::vector<LHEParticle*>& LHEEvent::getParticles() {
00075         return particles_;
